_protocol: Marantz SR7400 Surround Sound Amplifier serial interface

watch_tv.comment: Watch TV. Turn on T-BOX, Turn on TV

watch_tv_with_surround_sound.comment: Turn on AMP, Turn on TV, Turn on T-box, Set AMP input to DSS (TBOX)

listen_to_music_via_airplay.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to multi-channel stereo

play_a_game_on_the_ps3.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to Auto

listen_to_music_on_the_ps3.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to Auto

watch_a_movie_on_the_ps3.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to Auto

watch_home_videos_on_the_ps3.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to Auto

turn_off.comment: Turn on AMP, Set AMP volume to normal, Set AMP audio input to VCR1, Set surround mode to Auto
